name: Trekk
description:
Move with WASD around the dungeons/skies of the Trekk universe as you hastily try to move through the complicated labyrinths.

Other controls:

R - Restart stage (Will go back to lvl 1 on endless)
Escape - Go back to main menu

How this submission meets the theme :
Your health is used up when you move.
Also, the blue object following you collects the coins and points, prevents you from being able to rewind your moves more than a couple of times and encourages speed in the player, lest it catches up.

Made in Java

Libraries used:
https://github.com/finnkuusisto/TinySound

Assets made in Paint.net

Background Soundtrack:

"Danger Storm" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
